@jreback latest push (https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/20062/commits/20b8d47ab3e39fb19b86ffe652dc11500ff88efa) has rebase with master, added a test for constructing empty indexes, and did the yield idea for looping through the index types, as well as the other change you asked for.

thanks @Dr-Irv 

not very happy with ``pandas/tests/indexes/test_base.py`` but that's another issue.
